results.title: Comparison of telmisartan with lisinopril in patients with mild-to-moderate hypertension.
results.text_hl: At the end of the maintenance period, supine @<m>DISEASE_261515</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:261515 @@@DBP@@@ was controlled in 83% and 87% of the @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, respectively, with systolic blood pressure over @<m>DISEASE_261515</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:261515 @@@DBP@@@ reductions of 23.8/16.6 mm Hg for @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ and 19.9/15.6 mm Hg for @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Neutel JM, Frishman WH, Oparil S, Papademitriou V, Guthrie G. Comparison of telmisartan with lisinopril in patients with mild-to-moderate hypertension. Am J Ther. 1999 May;6(3):161-6. PMID: 10423659
citations.BibTeX: @article{10423659, title={Comparison of telmisartan with lisinopril in patients with mild-to-moderate hypertension.}, author={Neutel JM and Frishman WH and Oparil S and Papademitriou V and Guthrie G}, journal={Am J Ther}, volume={6}, number={3}, pages={161-6}}

results.title: Zofenopril versus Lisinopril in the Treatment of Essential Hypertension in Elderly Patients : A Randomised, Double-Blind, Multicentre Study.
results.text_hl: The percentage of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with normalised sitting @<m>DISEASE_261515</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:261515 @@@DBP@@@ (<90mm Hg) and the rate of treatment responders (reduction of sitting @<m>DISEASE_261515</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:261515 @@@DBP@@@ >/=10mm Hg) were not significantly different between the two treatment groups (normalised: @CHEMICAL_zofenopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C044958 @@@zofenopril@@@ 81.3% vs @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 76.7%; responders: @CHEMICAL_zofenopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C044958 @@@zofenopril@@@ 74.7% vs @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 77.8%).

citations.NLM: Malacco E, Piazza S, Omboni S, Zofenopril Study Group. Zofenopril versus Lisinopril in the Treatment of Essential Hypertension in Elderly Patients : A Randomised, Double-Blind, Multicentre Study. Clin Drug Investig. 2005;25(3):175-82. PMID: 17523766
citations.BibTeX: @article{17523766, title={Zofenopril versus Lisinopril in the Treatment of Essential Hypertension in Elderly Patients : A Randomised, Double-Blind, Multicentre Study.}, author={Malacco E and Piazza S and Omboni S and Zofenopril Study Group}, journal={Clin Drug Investig}, volume={25}, number={3}, pages={175-82}}
